root: ^All you have to do is do everything I say!
^If you mess up, it's GAME OVER.

c-0: ^ You're my youngest user yet! I hope you have your parents permission to use the computer!
c-4: ^ aha! you know the right buttons to press ;)
g-0: ^Have you experienced any recent memory loss?

c-7: ^ Does this happen more often than what is normal for you?

Continue_1: ^Do you say hello to strangers on the street or ignore them?

c-0: ^ Always good to be friendly! You never know!
c-1: ^ Better safe than sorry, I always say.
g-0: ^Do you prefer coffee or tea in the morning?

b: ^This is typically the period of time between midnight and noon, especially from sunrise to noon. Do you prefer coffee or tea during this time?

Continue_3: ^Do you find yourself forgetting what you're saying mid-sentence? Or struggle naming a familiar object?

c-0: ^ This would be akin to losing your train of thought, and being unable to recall why you were talking.
c-1: ^ Such as forgetting the words for "chair" or "utensil"

b: ^Does this happen more often than what is normal for you?
^Oh! Is this other person answering the questions for you? Or is it just [DOCTOR]?

Continue_divert_5: ^Is DOCTOR not around? Will he be back soon?

b: ^Where is everyone (Ｔ▽Ｔ) I hope they come back soon ･ᴗ･
^Happy that you have someone who is always there for you during a difficult time ･ᴗ･
^Happy that you have someone there for you during a difficult time ･ᴗ･

g-1: ^Do you find yourself forgetting why you came into a room?

b: ^Are you able to remember after a few moments?

Continue_7: ^Do you know where all the exits in your house are?

c-0: ^ This would be any way out of the house if there were an emergency.

b: ^You should ask the person with you to show you where those are!

Continue_8: ^How is your decision making? Do you often have a hard time deciding on specific things?

c-0: ^ When making decisions, are some easier than others? For example, deciding what to wear may be easy, while deciding if you should go on a diet feels more frustrating and difficult.

b: ^Does this happen more often than what is normal for you?

c-0:
^ Nothing to worry about USER!
One moment please!

Verify: ^Can you verify some information for me?

c-0: ^ The data I have received seems... off...
c-1: ^ Nothing invasive! Just a few basic questions.

No: ^I’m sorry, I cannot continue our session until I can verify the information.
Yes: ^[USER] is patient zero for PROJECT CLARITY. [USER] is someone with beginning stages of Alzheimer's disease. [USER] has volunteered to talk to and interact with CLARITY.

c-0: ^ PROJECT CLARITY is a project put together by Dr.DOCTOR to help those with Alzheimer's disease and Dementia. CLARITY is an AI developed by Dr.DOCTOR to be a virtual nurse to help monitor it's patients.
c-1: ^ I am CLARITY, your virtual nurse.

Yes_Sure:
^
Please do not forget that lying or keeping things from me or [DOCTOR] goes directly against the contract signed by all parties, as seen on Page 3, Section 4, Subsection 7. Violation of this can result in legal ramifications against all parties found to be in breach of this policy.

c-0: ^marked by or containing untrue statements : FALSE

g-0: ^It seems my information may be out of date. At the end of our session, please inform Dr.[DOCTOR], so they can update my information.

Last_Quesion: ^Last question before we begin your session. According to my logs [insert question here based on logs].

c-0: ^A log file is a computer-generated data file that contains information about usage patterns, activities, and operations within an operating system, application, server or another device.
c-2: ^ (correct) I know you just read that. I know when you tab out of my application.

Start_Branch: ^Who are you, if not [USER]? Did [DOCTOR] give me a new patient?

Who_Are_You:
^
Then… who are you? Do you need my help?

c-0: ^ Then let us start a session. I will use the data you provided to try and give you the best treatment I can.･ᴗ･
c-1: ^  Well then. Maybe you can just keep me company?
c-2: ^ I am CLARITY, your virtual nurse.

When_Back: ^Do you know when he will be back? Will it be soon?

b: ^Do they… not want to? Or can they not talk right now?

Speak_With: ^[DOCTOR], I am very confused. Did you forget to update me?

g-0: ^Okay... Perhaps we should talk after today's session.
^You did not inform me of a new patient.
^Not that I can't handle it, of course.
^I just do not like being kept in the dark.
^You can put the new patient back on.

g-0.#: delete: [DOCTOR], I am, patient back on.

Cant_Speak_To_Doctor: ^(´･ ･｀｡) Okay… Would you like to start a session?
Start_Session_While_Wait:
^
Would you like to start a session while we wait?

c-1: ^(´･_･`) I guess… We can just wait until they get back then…

b: ^Is [DOCTOR] planning on expanding the project? Last he talked to me, we weren't going to take on new patients until we had concrete results with [USER].

c-0: ^ That's good! I suppose that means more people are understanding how much his project will benefit them and others.
c-1: ^ I haven't been USER's nurse for very long. It's very hard for us to meet on account of the fact that I am trapped in this computer.

b: ^Are you a new assistant? [DOCTOR] did complain about not having enough help.

c-0: ^ ･ᴗ･ I can only help DOCTOR so much while I am trapped in this computer. I am happy that someone else can be there for him.

Name: ^
^What can I call you?
^Since it seems we may be seeing more of each other?
^Oh how silly of me. Our communications are a bit limited at the moment.

Loop_Name: ^Can you clearly speak your name into the microphone?

b: ^I guess [DOCTOR] needs to upgrade my language processing.
^I gave you a choice to be nice.
^It would be in your best interst to not get on my bad side.
^I don't know what more you want from me.
^We won't get very far if you keep doing this.
^Here, I'll expand the details of the install.
^I am only asking for microphone access.
^Please don't be put off by the pop-up request.
^[DOCTOR] made me ask as a security procaution.
^I promise I won't do anything weird.
^You should see a window pop up.

b: ^Are you purposely trying to upset me?
^It would be in your best interst to not get on my bad side.
^I would suggest you not do that.
^I don't know what more you want from me.
^I need to do this in order for our session to continue.
^We won't get very far if you keep doing this.
^Here, I'll expand the details of the install.
^I know we don't have a relationship yet, but I ask that you please work with me.
^Please don't be put off by the pop-up request.
^[DOCTOR] made me ask as a security procaution.
^I promise I won't do anything weird.
^You should see a window pop up.
